function.description:
This construct prints a message to the console. If the provided value of the 'text' parameter is an OBJECT or LIST variable then the JSON representation will be printed. If the provided value is an ATOMIC variable then the textual representation will be printed.
The 'logLevel' parameter can be used to change the log level of the message. The available log levels are: 'debug', 'info', 'warning' and 'error'.
